mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.title, m.cover_image, a.name as artist_name, a.id as artist_id, am.title as album_title, am.id as album_id, m.duration, m.file_url FROM musics m LEFT JOIN playlist_musics pm ON pm.music_id = m.id LEFT JOIN playlists p ON p.id = pm.playlist_id LEFT JOIN artists a ON m.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN albums am On am.id = m.album_id WHERE p.id = #{id}
